name: Sicarios
description:
Sicarios

Poor Breno lives in a slum where drugs, prostitution and violence are part of everyday life. The neighborhood is ruled by a drug gang who make their own laws. They do everything there to defend their territory. When some members of a rival gang sell drugs in their neighborhood, they are cleared out by hitmen called sicarios.

Play this point-n-click adventure and experience the story of Breno who gets caught up in the world of violence.

The demo version is partially free to play and censored. The full version is not suitable for children.

You can contact me at info@bonumangame.com
Please give me a nice feedback - it is much appreciated.

Currently, there is only an Android version available.
